name: Ore Refinery
desc:
Refits %s/%s available cargo space, depending on hull size, into ore refinery, allowing for refining of raw ores into processed forms. It requires additional %s/%s crew and %s/%s supplies per month, depending on hull size.

Installable only on cruisers or capital ships with civilian-grade hull.

name: Fuel Centrifuge
desc:
Refits %s/%s available cargo space, depending on hull size, into fuel centrifuge, allowing for centrifuging of volatiles into fuel.  It requires additional %s/%s crew and %s/%s supplies per month, depending on hull size.

Installable only on cruisers or capital ships with civilian-grade hull.

name: Supply Manufacture
desc: This forge module manufactures supplies from metal and transplutonics.

name: Machinery Assembly
desc: This forge module assembles heavy machinery from metal and transplutonics.
